items.title: Handwave lends a hand to retailers with its European alternative to Amazon’s palm payments
items.description: Latvian startup Handwave aims to compete with Amazon palm payments by offering an independent alternative.

items.title: Female-founded semiconductor AI startup SixSense raises $8.5M

items.title: Apple projects tariff costs will hit $1.1B next quarter

items.title: Reddit revenue soars as it bets on AI and advertising
items.description: Reddit reported its Q2 earnings, and it’s clear that its focus on AI has ramped up significantly.
